thread.title: Traffic: Heavy congestion on Western Avenue, Cardiff
thread.title_full: Traffic: Heavy congestion on Western Avenue, Cardiff | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Traffic: Heavy congestion on Western Avenue, Cardiff
text:
Cardiff Council says there is still heavy traffic congestion on Western Avenue westbound following an accident, although the road has been reopened.
City of Cardiff @cardiffcouncil Follow TRAFFIC: Western Avenue Westbound under Gabalfa Interchange has now been reopened but still heavy with congestion
09:28 - 9 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Travel Cardiff
